color-bg-fill.description: Used as the page background color

color-on-bg-fill.description: Used as the text color associated with `background: var(--tfl-color-bg)`

color-bg-fill-hovered.description: Used as hovered-state background-color for elements with same background color as page

color-on-bg-fill-hovered.description: Used as the text color associated with `background: var(--tfl-color-bg-fill-hovered)`

color-bg-fill-selected.description: Used as selected-state background-color for elements with same background color as page

color-on-bg-fill-selected.description: Used as the text color associated with `background: var(--tfl-color-bg-fill-selected)`

color-bg-fill-backdrop.description: Used as the backdrop (in dialogs) color for page background

color-on-bg-fill-backdrop.description: Used as the text color associated with `background: var(--tfl-color-bg-fill-backdrop)`

color-primary-fill.description: Used as the default background color for primary actions (eg buttons)

color-on-primary-fill.description: Used as the text color associated with `background: var(--tfl-color-primary-fill)`

color-primary-fill-hovered.description: Used as the hovered-state background color for primary actions (eg buttons)

color-on-primary-fill-hovered.description: Used as the text color associated with `background: var(--tfl-color-primary-fill-hovered)`

color-primary-fill-pressed.description: Used as the pressed-state background color for primary actions (eg buttons)

color-on-primary-fill-pressed.description: Used as the text color associated with `background: var(--tfl-color-primary-fill-pressed)`

color-primary-fill-disabled.description: Used as the disabled-state background color for primary actions (eg buttons)

color-on-primary-fill-disabled.description: Used as the text color associated with `background: var(--tfl-color-primary-fill-disabled)`

color-primary-border.description: Used as the default border color for primary actions (eg buttons)

color-primary-text.description: Used as the default text color for primary text

color-dialog-fill.description: Used as the default background color for dialogs and/or anything that overlays other content

color-on-dialog-fill.description: Used as the text color associated with `background: var(--tfl-color-dialog-fill)`

color-surface-fill.description: Used as the default background color for surfaces (modals, cards, low-priority buttons, etc...)

color-on-surface-fill.description: Used as the text color associated with `background: var(--tfl-color-surface-fill)`

color-surface-fill-hovered.description: Used as the hovered-state background color for surfaces (modals, cards, low-priority buttons, etc...)

color-on-surface-fill-hovered.description: Used as the text color associated with `background: var(--tfl-color-surface-fill-hovered)`

color-surface-fill-pressed.description: Used as the pressed-state background color for surfaces (modals, cards, low-priority buttons, etc...)

color-on-surface-fill-pressed.description: Used as the text color associated with `background: var(--tfl-color-surface-fill-pressed)`

color-surface-fill-disabled.description: Used as the disabled-state background color for surfaces (modals, cards, low-priority buttons, etc...)

color-on-surface-fill-disabled.description: Used as the text color associated with `background: var(--tfl-color-surface-fill-disabled)`

color-surface-border.description: Used as the default border color for surfaces (modals, cards, low-priority buttons, etc...)

color-surface-border-selected.description: Used as the selected-state border color for surfaces (modals, cards, low-priority buttons, etc...)

color-critical-border.description: Used as the default border color for errors / critical messages

color-critical-text.description: Used as the default text color for errors / critical messages
